devdoc.details: Send ERC20/ERC721 to multiple account at once Features:  No transaction fees  Protection against gas griefing  User-friendly error messages: Lists each address if transfer fails  Audited using the reputable tool(=`slither`)

multisendERC20(address,address[],uint256.details: Transfer erc20 to multiple receipients Revert if the transferring operation consume `MAX_GAS_MULTIPLIER` times larger gas then standard

params.baseGas_: the basic gas consumption of transferring operation

multisendERC721(address,address[],uint25.details: Transfer erc721 to multiple receipients Revert if the transferring operation consume `MAX_GAS_MULTIPLIER` times larger gas then standard

params.baseGas_: the basic gas consumption of transferring operation
